description: Joker, also known as the Clown Prince of Crime, is a psychotic criminal mastermind with a sadistic sense of humor and a long-standing arch-nemesis of Batman.
name: Joker

description: Harley Quinn, also known as Dr. Harleen Quinzel, is a former psychiatrist turned crazed criminal and love interest of the Joker, known for her playful yet deadly demeanor.
name: Harley Quinn

description: Batman, also known as Bruce Wayne, is a billionaire vigilante who fights crime in Gotham City using his intellect, martial arts skills, and an arsenal of gadgets.
name: Batman

description: Superman, also known as Clark Kent or Kal-El, is a powerful alien superhero with abilities such as super strength, flight, and heat vision, dedicated to protecting Earth from evil threats.
name: Superman

description: Wonder Woman, also known as Diana Prince, is an Amazonian warrior princess with superhuman strength and agility, wielding the Lasso of Truth and other divine weapons to fight for justice.
name: Wonder Woman

description: Doomsday is a genetically-engineered monstrous being bred for destruction, known for his role in the Death of Superman storyline as one of the Man of Steel's most formidable adversaries.
name: Doomsday

description: Aquaman, also known as Arthur Curry, is the king of the underwater kingdom of Atlantis with superhuman strength, telepathic communication with marine life, and control over the seas.
name: Aquaman

description: Cyborg, also known as Victor Stone, is a superhero with cybernetic enhancements, granting him superhuman strength, durability, and various technological abilities.
name: Cyborg

description: Green Arrow, also known as Oliver Queen, is a skilled archer and vigilante who fights crime using his accuracy with a bow and arrow, along with his keen intellect and martial arts skills.
name: Green Arrow

description: Deadshot, also known as Floyd Lawton, is a deadly assassin and expert marksman known for his impeccable aim and willingness to take on any job for the right price.
name: Dead Shot

description: Hawkman, also known as Carter Hall, is a reincarnated ancient Egyptian prince armed with a mystical Nth metal harness that grants him flight, enhanced strength, and the ability to reincarnate across time.
name: Hawkman

description: Nightwing, also known as Dick Grayson, is the original Robin and former sidekick to Batman who later adopts the identity of Nightwing, operating as a skilled acrobat and detective in his own right.
name: Night Wing

description: The Flash, also known as Barry Allen or Wally West, is a superhero with the ability to move at superhuman speeds, using his powers to fight crime and protect Central City as the Scarlet Speedster.
name: Flash

description: Green Lantern, also known as Hal Jordan or John Stewart, is a member of the intergalactic police force known as the Green Lantern Corps, wielding a power ring that allows him to create constructs out of green light and defend the universe from evil.
name: Green Lantern

description: Captain Boomerang, also known as George 'Digger' Harkness, is a criminal with a talent for using boomerangs as deadly weapons, often clashing with the Flash and other superheroes.
name: Captain Boomerang
